name: One Small Favor (itch)
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • A to interact/continue dialogue
  • Hold S to run
  • You can also resize the window to any size you want

In this game you need to make breakfast in bed for your girlfriend... and you're all out of bacon.

Short game, maybe 20min.

Content warning; implied sex and sex existing in the universe.

Everything is created by me other than that pretty art for the icon my gf @sloppydraws drew for me.

I have uploaded linux and osx versions however it is not possible for me to test them. I hope they work.

Consider supporting me if you like my work! All donations will go towards feeding this poor little transgirl.

https://twitter.com/littanana

https://www.patreon.com/littanana
